description: The car checks all the boxes you want ticked in a compact electric car, and more. Read more at straitstimes.com.
title: Car review: Peugeot e-2008 GT is a peachy plug-in
title_page: Car review: Peugeot e-2008 GT is a peachy plug-in | The Straits Times
maintext:
SINGAPORE â€“ When people ask me which is the best electric car they can buy, I never had a good answer. Until now.
I can say quite confidently that the new Peugeot e-2008 GT is the best electric model you can buy in the mass-market segment.
